userStories.name: Create voyage.
userStories.description: Allows to create a trip for a given cargo. Specifying the necessary movements to reach the destination.

userStories.name: Handle cargo event.
userStories.description: Allows to register or create an event in a location indicating the date when the event ends.

userStories.name: Add Carrier Movement.
userStories.description: Allows to add a carrier movement for a created trip, specify where the carrier is on a given date.

userStories.name: Create location.
userStories.description: Allows to create a location specifying its name and identifier.

userStories.name: View tracking.
userStories.description: Allows to check the tracking of the trip or cargo according to the Tracking Id.

userStories.name: Create cargo.
userStories.description: Allows to create a cargo to transport. A Tracking Id is generated. An itinerary, a route specification and a delivery are associated.

dependencies.name: Schedule cargo â€“ create route specification

userStories.name: Route Cargo.
userStories.description: Allows to create a cargo itinerary specifying its stops.

userStories.name: Create leg.
userStories.description: Create a stop for an itinerary.

userStories.name: Book cargo.
userStories.description: Create the cargo shipment, the route is specified by entering an origin and destination location and a delivery deadline date is established.

userStories.name: Change cargo destination.
userStories.description: Allows to modify the destination of a shipped cargo.

userStories.name: Create delivery.
userStories.description: Allows to create and associate a delivery to the cargo, calculate an estimated delivery date having in mind the status of the carriers and the routes.

userStories.name: Get locations.
userStories.description: Allows to obtain the list of available locations.

userStories.name: Get carrier status.
userStories.description: Allows to obtain the state of the carriers.

userStories.name: Get routes status.
userStories.description: Allows to obtain the status of the routes.
